pr_title: Remove Answer Text View in Url Widget

timeline.bodyText: As discussed the URL widget should behave exactly the same in read only mode (as it is always "read only"). That being the case you shouldn't need any tests for read only for the widget.
timeline.author: seadowg

timeline.bodyText: As in other comments: lets remove any change in behaviour based on isReadOnly
timeline.author: seadowg

timeline.bodyText: This doesn't seem right as it's the same as the AUDIO_QUESTION. I think the AUDIO_QUESTION naming and description is just wrong here and probably should be PROMPT and really be used to just track any kind of question/widget.
timeline.author: seadowg

timeline.bodyText: I think the action here should just be "Url". What we care about is that the user saw a url question.
timeline.author: seadowg

timeline.message: remove answer text view in url widget
add analytics call to track number of form definitions with url widget
remove readOnly beahviour for url widget
